The '''''Tour EP''''' is an EP by [[Band of Horses]], which preceded their debut album, ''[[Everything All the Time]]''. The self-released EP was initially sold at shows and was later made available in limited quantities at [[Sub Pop]]'s website.<ref>[http://www.subpop.com/releases/band_of_horses/eps/limited_edition_tour_ep "Band of Horses / Limited Edition Tour EP - BOH001"] ''Sub Pop''</ref> It features early versions of five tracks from ''Everything All the Time'' as well as the otherwise unavailable track "(Biding Time Is A) Boat To Row."

| note6 = Live
| length6 = 3:44
